ygData.subject: Re: More robe questions.
ygData.msgSnippet: I d buy another if I were you.. I may be a while before you can get a better one. Tandayen, Dark Elf Wizard ... From: James  To:
ygData.messageBody:
I'd buy another if I were you.. I may be a while before you can get a better one.

Tandayen, Dark Elf Wizard


-----Original Message-----
From: James <redevil000@...>
To: eq_wizards@onelist.com <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
Date: Thursday, May 06, 1999 6:08 PM
Subject: Re: [eq_wizards] More robe questions.


ok... I'm a lvl 8 wizard (almost 9) and I just lost my SR. apprentice robe to 3rd lvl befallen, since I followed my friend down the well entrance and I got killed. I asked a friendly high level shaman if he could get my stuff and he did, except he couldn't get the robe since it's a sr apprentice robe. I don't really mind being without a robe, but was wondering if I should buy another sr. apprentice robe (that'd mean leaving antonica and heading back to ak'anon to get one that fits me) or just wait till I'm strong enough to get the other robe that you speak of?
-----Original Message-----
From: Mata <mata_eq@...>
To: eq_wizards@onelist.com <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
Date: Thursday, May 06, 1999 9:16 AM
Subject: Re: [eq_wizards] More robe questions.


Do you have to be the one to LOOT the robe from him in befallen or can a TANK loot the body then give you the robe??? Cus it would stink to have to try to kill him again if a TANK accidentaly looted his body . . . (I you do kill him for his robe right?)

----- Original Message -----
From: Chris Trubiani
To: eq_wizards@onelist.com
Sent: Thursday, May 06, 1999 9:15 AM
Subject: Re: [eq_wizards] More robe questions.


There is no better robe than the Sr. Aprentice robes that you can buy. From now on you'll have to quest to get a better one. I'd suggest starting with the thermateugist (sp?) robe you get from the necro thermateugist (sp?) on the third floor of befallen. Have fun..

Tandayen, Dark Elf Wizard


-----Original Message-----
From: James <redevil000@...>
To: eq_wizards@onelist.com <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
Date: Thursday, May 06, 1999 7:57 AM
Subject: [eq_wizards] More robe questions.


What is the next step up from the Sr. Apprentice robes, where can I buy it, and how much does it cost? Thanks, Lott.
